projects.name: Phalcon Website
projects.summary: The official website of Phalcon, written with Phalcon!
projects.description: Phalcon is a web framework implemented as a C extension offering high performance and lower resource consumption.

projects.name: Phalcon Community Discussion Forum
projects.summary: The Phalcon Community Discussion Forum where Phalconians can ask questions, find answers, offer advice etc.
projects.description: The Phalcon Community Discussion Forum is powered by PhalconPHP. The application offers discussions, my discussions, categories, +1/-1 functionality, karma measurements, and login with Github.

projects.name: Phalcon Powered Email Campaign Platform
projects.summary: Hypermailer is an email platform utilizing Mailgun APIs built with Phalcon.
projects.description: Hypermailer is an open source project aimed at leveraging Mailgun APIs to provide a free platform that operates on the usage only billing of Mailgun. This project will continuously evolve and is currently the only open source email platform leveraging Mailgun's APIs. All project files and source code are available on GitHub.

projects.name: Hybrid mobile development cloud for cross-platform app
projects.summary: Herlock is a cloud based mobile app development environment. Supports iOS/Android hybrid apps in one source.
projects.description: Introducing cross-platform mobile development tool that allows you to easily create fast Android and iOS apps as quick as possible using Javascript. By using Open GL, you can build an app that requires high performance graphics without sacrificing performance.

projects.name: Imageboard for intelligent individuals
projects.summary: Hurma.tv is a popular image blog with a lot of interesting brain-improving facts about everything
projects.description: Hurma.tv project is a great collection of interesting facts which are added regularly. All the stuff is filtered accurately and provides a lot of fun for the viewers. The web-site is fully adaptive and works on all platforms from iMac to ancient Nokia 3110
projects.info: vk.com group can be found at vk.com/hurmmma, twitter is https://twitter.com/hurma_tv

projects.name: The forgetful messaging service
projects.summary: Delete.im is a non-permanent sharing service. It allows users to send messages that’ll delete once they’ve been viewed. We’ve created a service where the sender has control of their information, not the receiver.
projects.description: Our API allows services to generate their own delete.im links. Whether they want to send out new passwords or allow their users to create deleteable messages. Our current integrations such as our Wordpress plug-in allows users to upload pictures to forums knowing that it will only be viewed a number of times before deleting itself. We see delete.im being a neutral service that people can trust with their information. We won’t collect, scan or keep people’s messages unlike the services they normally use.

projects.name: Giada
projects.description: Giada is a free, minimal, hardcore audio tool for DJs, live performers and electronic musicians. How does it work? Just pick up your channel, fill it with samples or MIDI events and start the show by using this tiny piece of software as a loop machine, drum machine, sequencer, live sampler or yet as a plugin/effect host. Giada aims to be a compact and portable virtual device for Linux, Mac OS X and Windows for production use and live sets.

projects.name: Robinson Travel Agency Website
projects.summary: robinson.rs is website created for one of most popular Serbian travel agencies.
projects.description: Website consists of two modules: frontend and backend. Both modules are custom made using PhalconPHP framework from scratch. Includes functional (controller) tests.

projects.name: DanzerLogs.com
projects.summary: Your source for buying logs online.
projects.description: DanzerLogs.com is the first website to offer hardwood logs for sale with actual photos and internal scanned images of individual logs.

projects.name: Kiwisoft
projects.summary: kiwisoft.co.uk is the website of a web design agency in the UK
projects.description: The website consists of just a frontend with a database powered porfolio and a wordpress.com REST API integration

projects.name: QuidditchUK
projects.summary: Website and management system for QuidditchUK
projects.description: Join QuidditchUK as a member, create your own team, get others to join, then get involved with user submitted events (friendly matches, tournaments) or challenge another team in the separate Challenge Shield League.
projects.info: Multi-module system with a complex ACL. In excess of 40 controllers, 220 actions, and over 75 models. Contact: webmaster@quidditchuk.org for more info

projects.name: Karakuri Hiden Website
projects.summary: The website of the Samurai Factory Inc
projects.description: The website has posted the technical information of Phalcon, PHP etc.

projects.name: searcHMO
projects.summary: A web application for searching accredited HMO provider in the Philippines.
projects.description: This web application is developed for the purpose of creating an application during a hackathon. It is developed using Phalcon and Processwire.

projects.name: Robert Bojor CV
projects.summary: An online CV powered by Phalcon and mongoDB
projects.description: Online CV and blog of Robert Bojor, web and mobile developer, crafted with <3, powered by Phalcon and mongoDB
projects.info: The website also features a blog and a small theme shop

projects.name: Stolarstwo Giemza
projects.summary: Carpentry Giemza page for the needs of the family business
projects.description: Company page carpentry, acting on ph 2.0.0 and mysql (Polish site)
